channel.title: ERP Security on Old Habits AI Hard
channel.description: Recent content in ERP Security on Old Habits AI Hard

item.title: Projects @ Deloitte
item.description: This post is a collection of projects I have worked on at Deloitte. These aren’t related to Machine Learning per se. The ML projects at Deloitte are tagged as Deloitte in their respective posts. Oracle Security and Controls: Implemented Oracle EBS and Oracle Cloud Security and Controls on FSCM (Financial Supply Chain Management) and HCM (Human Capital Management) modules on multiple client engagements. Responsible for role builds, defect resolution, data security and access provisioning.
